A Psalm of David<S>1732</S>. I will praise<S>3034</S> thee with my whole heart<S>3820</S>: before the gods<S>430</S> will I sing praise<S>2167</S> unto thee.
I will worship<S>7812</S> toward thy holy<S>6944</S> temple<S>1964</S>, and praise<S>3034</S> thy name<S>8034</S> for thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S> and for thy truth<S>571</S>: for thou hast magnified<S>1431</S> thy word<S>565</S> above all thy name<S>8034</S>.
In the day<S>3117</S> when I cried<S>7121</S> thou answeredst<S>6030</S> me, and strengthenedst<S>7292</S> me with strength<S>5797</S> in my soul<S>5315</S>.
All the kings<S>4428</S> of the earth<S>776</S> shall praise<S>3034</S> thee, O LORD<S>3068</S>, when they hear<S>8085</S> the words<S>561</S> of thy mouth<S>6310</S>.
Yea, they shall sing<S>7891</S> in the ways<S>1870</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>: for great<S>1419</S> is the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Though the LORD<S>3068</S> be high<S>7311</S>, yet hath he respect<S>7200</S> unto the lowly<S>8217</S>: but the proud<S>1364</S> he knoweth<S>3045</S> afar off<S>4801</S>.
Though I walk<S>3212</S> in the midst<S>7130</S> of trouble<S>6869</S>, thou wilt revive<S>2421</S> me: thou shalt stretch forth<S>7971</S> thine hand<S>3027</S> against the wrath<S>639</S> of mine enemies<S>341</S>, and thy right hand<S>3225</S> shall save<S>3467</S> me.
The LORD<S>3068</S> will perfect<S>1584</S> that which concerneth me: thy mercy<S>2617</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, endureth for ever<S>5769</S>: forsake<S>7503</S> not the works<S>4639</S> of thine own hands<S>3027</S>.
